name: AuditApp_Attributes_ChangesForActor
query:
SELECT  
    datetime(OM.DateTime, 'localtime') AS 'Operation DT',
    ST.SystemName AS 'System',
    OP.Name AS 'Operation',
    AT.Name AS 'Process',
    O.KeyValue AS 'Object Key Value',
    O.DisplayName AS 'Object Display Name',
    AU.AttributeName AS 'Attribute',
    AU.ValueOld AS 'Old',
    AU.ValueNew AS 'New'
FROM (
    SELECT ID, ActivityTypeID FROM Activities WHERE UserID = $Key1
) AC
INNER JOIN ActivityTypes AT ON AT.ID = AC.ActivityTypeID
INNER JOIN ObjectMutations OM ON OM.ActivityID = AC.ID
INNER JOIN AttributeUpdates AU ON AU.ObjectMutationID = OM.ID
INNER JOIN Operations OP ON OP.ID = OM.OperationID
INNER JOIN Objects O ON O.ID = OM.ObjectID
INNER JOIN SystemTables ST ON ST.ID = O.SystemTableID
ORDER BY OM.DateTime DESC
